name: Eroding Deep
description: A turn based rpg revolving around basic math. I made this for a school project which was meant to just be a math questioner but over the term break it got alot larger in scope. This is a demo and I probably wont work on it anymore since I didn't use a game engine for it. All it's using is python and pythons PIL (python imaging library) and pygame to handle the music and sounds.
